QuestData.Title: The Great Cranium Caper
QuestData.Description:
Sandfury thugs attacked de inn after you left and kidnapped de whole Goldtusk Gang!
We gotta get dem back.
Man'zul was usually de brains behind our thefts back in Zuldazar, but I'll try to come up with a plan to get dem outta dis mess.
<Rhan'ka thinks for awhile.>
I got it! You rescue 'em all!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue the kidnapped members of the Goldtusk Gang in the Sandfury Hideout.
